review_data.title: Great Pizza!
review_data.content: We had an amazing pizza. The prices are good and the waitress was really nice :) Tolle Pizza, super Preise. Sehr nette Bedienung!

review_data.title: Bela pizza.)
review_data.content: The pizzas were very good, with plenty of choices, as it’s a takeaway also there were many people that just went there to pick up the pizzas. The restaurant is near the Hotel Neufed. The girl that served us was very friendly.

review_data.title: Warm welcome. Good beer
review_data.content: We tried this place to escape the rain and we were glad we did. Barmaid was very welcoming and friendly. The beer menu has a range of Feldschlosschen beers, draught and bottled. The food menu looked appetising and people seemed to be enjoying what they...More
